text: Command Prompt (also known as cmd.exe, cmd) is a Windows program found in all windows versions that can be used to execute commands (for example `ping google.com` will ping the Google website, and `taskkilll /F /IM iexplore.exe /T` will forcefully terminate the Internet Explorer application. The Command Prompt is also found in other operating systems, such as ReactOS and Linux. Category:Microsoft Windows software
title: Command prompt
